column4: how do I view my system logging for ubuntu 10.10 so that I can see if my computer is finding an mp3 player that I've just connected?
I've got a Sansa Fuze & haven't had any problems with it on Ubuntu, its worked perfectly, all I do is plug it in & it gets mounted as a usb drive
On teh Fuze, you may need to go into the settings menu and set the USB Mode to MSC, I can't rememebr whether that was something I needed to do
